H is for Health

Health is a way to track damage to an object

Take a look at the sprite in the game. The sprite has full health to start the game. Each click of the sprite will reduce the health by 10. Once the sprite reaches 0 health, it will be killed. See the controls

Controls
  • Inflict 10 damage on the sprite

References

The following other lessons have been referenced:

  • K is for Kill
  • S is for Sprite
